interpretation:
The Gear card represents movement, progress, and the workings of the universe. Just as gears work together to create motion, this card signifies the importance of cooperation and teamwork. It suggests that you may need to adjust and align yourself with those around you to achieve your goals. The Gear card also symbolizes the interconnectedness of all things and the idea that everything is part of a larger system. It is a reminder to stay curious and explore the inner workings of the world around you.

In a reading, the Gear card may indicate that it is time to take action and make progress towards your goals. It can also suggest that you need to work with others to achieve success. Alternatively, it may be a sign to pay attention to the details and inner workings of a situation, and to look for patterns and connections. This card encourages you to trust the flow of the universe and to embrace change as a natural part of life.
